backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product data, order types, in‑memory product list, and query endpoints for fetching products.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping publishing- and share-related features to involved files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across routing, UI, cart, checkout, and publish/share flows.
frontend/.env.example: Example env file allowing optional override of the live public site URL for publish/share UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer CSS defining OKLCH-driven color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for Home, About, Products, and Contact using AppShell as the root layout.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartLineIte: Renders a cart item row with quantity controls and remove button, without price display.
frontend/src/components/cart/StickyCartB: Placeholder component returning null after cart UI removal.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Checkou: Checkout form with local validation for required fields and submit handler.
frontend/src/components/checkout/OrderSu: Displays a simple list of items and shipping country without pricing.
frontend/src/components/contact/Floating: Floating WhatsApp chat button linking to generated WhatsApp URL.
frontend/src/components/contact/WhatsApp: Inline WhatsApp button showing icon and label using shared URL utility.
Layout wrapper rendering header, routed content, footer, and floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with logo, contact info, social link, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Provides a responsive header with navigation links, logo, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/media/Responsive: Simple wrapper for a responsive lazy-loaded image element.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product with image, category label, description, and a WhatsApp contact button.
frontend/src/components/publish/PublishS: Share dialog that shows the public site URL and provides copy-to-clipboard functionality with error handling.
frontend/src/components/shipping/Interna: Shows a small callout indicating that international shipping is available.
frontend/src/components/shipping/Shippin: Lists supported shipping countries with a styled header and grid layout.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Defines centralized contact information including phone and email details.
frontend/src/constants/copy.ts: Centralized text constants for navigation, shipping, cart, checkout, footer, and publish features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and login/logout management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching products and orders, filtering product results, and placing orders via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing the company’s heritage, quality, and international reach.
frontend/src/pages/CartCheckoutPage.tsx: Placeholder component returning no cart or checkout UI.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information, phone and WhatsApp details, and social media links.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with hero content, CTAs, feature highlights, and shipping info.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays products with loading/error states and a UI-level product filter.
frontend/src/state/cart/CartContext.tsx: Implements cart state management with add, update, remove, and persistence in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/state/cart/cartSelectors.ts: Provides utility functions to calculate line totals and cart subtotal.
frontend/src/utils/publicUrl.ts: Resolves the public site URL using env overrides, runtime origin, and production safeguards.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp messaging URL using configured contact info and an optional custom message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions (colors, fonts, shadows, animations), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, versioning, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for a storefront refocus away from cart/checkout flows.
